title: ChillyMatthew
author: ChillyMatthew
content: GN/GM Crypto fam  I've recently come across this story about Telegram planning to launch its own wallet/exchange and wanted to see your opinion on the matter, since I don't know how to feel about it or if it's good for the overall crypto space or not.QuoteTelegram’s founder and CEO, Pavel Durov, announced today on his Telegram channel that he is planning to build "a set of decentralized tools." These will include non-custodial wallets and a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange. Durov also talked about the state of centralization in digital assets, and the role FTX played in it.Do you think that this could actually work, and potentially be a decent rival to Binance? Sources:https://tokenist.com/telegram-slams-crypto-over-centralization-plans-own-wallet-exchange/https://app.getresponse.com/view.html?x=a62b&m=BVIvsN&mc=9M&s=BtgXWnG&u=QcLhh&z=EVQsIuo&

comments.author: BD Crypto
comments.body: If telegram launch their own wallet or exchange I hope that will create a big news in crypto world. And a lot of telegram users will be interested to invest in Cryptocurrencies. So my thinking about this news is positive.

comments.author: Hildentine
comments.body: Yes I hear this news if this news is true so its very interesting if telegram make their own wallet and exchange so alot people use their wallet and exchange and people easily invest there money in to telegram exchange because people show interest into this news.

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: ChillyMatthew on December 07, 2022, 05:05:28 PMQuoteTelegram’s founder and CEO, Pavel Durov, announced today on his Telegram channel that he is planning to build "a set of decentralized tools." These will include non-custodial wallets and a decentralized cryptocurrency exchange. Durov also talked about the state of centralization in digital assets, and the role FTX played in it.Do you think that this could actually work, and potentially be a decent rival to Binance? This is one of the best news I have read so far, creating a Telegram wallet and exchange for cryptocurrencies will have an impact on the crypto market in general. Where Telegram is one of the most downloaded applications by users in the world for the year 2022 and has more than 700 million active users, so it is one of the most popular applications and its involvement in blockchain technology will attract millions of users to engage in investing and trading cryptocurrencies, and Telegram may become one of the best worthy competitors for the Binance platform in the future and for other exchanges, I am very excited to try out Telegram's new decentralized developments and features.

comments.author: passwordnow
comments.body: It's not surprising since they've got their TON. Potential rival of Binance? We don't know. As a messaging app, it's one of the most used in the world and we still have no idea if its plan of having its own wallet and exchange will be liked by most of its users. Maybe, or not. But if it's going to show something good about it and it's not going to be asking for KYC then for sure that many users will start using and exchanging there, as most of the exchanges are like that in the beginning.

comments.author: kelonmusk
comments.body: I'am not aware of the specific details of this proposed project, but I have heard that Telegram is not only building its own blockchain, but is also planning to launch other decentralized systems.I think, if this plan is correct the number of Telegram subscribers alone is enough to give it a bigger market share than most exchanges. However, its long-term vision is to create an entirely new decentralized exchange app ecosystem, making it a potential rival to Binance or other centralized exchanges. In that sense, it may not be a direct rival but rather a catalyst for disruption in the cryptocurrency exchange industry.
